name: CORTEVA AGRISCIENCE
description: Development and distribution of seed and crop protection technologies for farmers.
sampleDescriptions: Protection of the active ingredient chlorpyrifos for uses by U.S. farmers, and support for federal policies that promote agricultural biotechnology. Support for international trade agreements.
Protection of the active ingredient chlorpyrifos for uses by U.S. farmers, and support for federal policies that promote agricultural biotechnology. Support for international trade agreements.
Protection of the active ingredient chlorpyrifos for uses by U.S. farmers, and support for federal policies that promote agricultural biotechnology. Support for international trade agreements.
Support for the U.S. Mexico Canada Free Trade Agreement, and support for the continued dialogue between the United States and Japan for a new trade agreement important to American agriculture.
Discussion and focus on Part 340, the recently proposed rule by USDA to establish a new regulatory approval process for the approval of genetically modified crop traits.
